summary: This mod adds bluejeans, t-shirts, and singlets for males.
descriptionHtml:
Blue Jeans, T-shirts, and Singlets (for males) Volume 2

NOTICE:  This mod has been updated/replaced with a new one located here:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19644/

This mod adds blue jeans, t-shirts and singlets (muscle shirts/a-shirts) to the game for males.  This mod replaces and adds to the earlier blue jeans and t-shirts mod.  

NOTE: Singlets are called many things.  We call them muscle shirts;  But I have heard them called: \"Tank tops\", \"A-shirts\", \"Vests\", \"Wife beaters\", and just \"sleeveless shirts\".

WARNING: This is not an immersion-friendly mod.

This mod is not tested on the Khajiit or Argonian character models.  

The clothing items are added to the inventory of the Radiant Raiments shop in Solitude.

There are no armour ratings or enchantments associated with the items.  


============================
CHANGELOG
============================
V. 2.0
Added singlets of various colours.
Repaired some mesh and vertex errors.
Correct some bone-weight errors.
Adjusted the alpha and normal maps some.
Reduced brightness of shirt colours.


============================
INSTALLING/UNINSTALLING
============================

To install:
Unpack the .7z file with \"7-zip\" or a similar programme.

Copy and paste the contents of the mod\'s data folder to your \"...skyrim/data/\" folder.

Or, alternatively,  a compliant mod manager can be used.

Enable \"bluejeans.esp\" in the launcher.

NOTE: If u have the earlier blue jeans and t-shirts mod installed, installing this mod will overwrite the old files with the corrected ones.  Just choose \"yes\" when it prompts if you want to merge and/or replace.

To uninstall:
Delete the files installed by this mod (listed in the readme) from your \"...skyrim/data/\" folder.  Or use your mod manager if it supports uninstalling.


============================
FILES
============================
Please see the readme for the file list.  It was too long to conveniently place here.


============================
CREDITS and PERMISSIONS
============================

Nancy Krantz...modelling and texturing.
Andrew Clements...skinning, export and Nifskope/creation kit work.
Bethesda...game, creation kit, commitment to great gaming.
Hundreds of wise forum participants from whom I have gathered massive amounts of knowledge.

Anyone is welcome to use any part of this mod however they would like.  No credits or permissions are needed.
author: Andrew Clements and Nancy Krantz
